member.name: M:RestAPI_HaiGame7.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: 根据手机号获取个人信息
member.returns: 返回值实例：[{"MessageCode":0,"Message":""}, {"db_ArticleComment":[],"db_AssetRecord":[],"db_GameIDofUser":[],"db_GameRecord":[],"db_GuessRecord":[],"db_MyCollection":[],"db_Report":[],"db_Team":[],"UserID":64,"Openid":null,"NickName":null,"UserPicture":null,"UserName":null,"PhoneNumber":"13439843883","CardID":null,"UserPassWord":"5d354089d5b6378016dca832d3645dbf","UserWebNickName":"不服","UserWebPicture":"http://images.haigame7.com/avatar/20160127162940WxExqw0paJXAo1AtXc4RzGYo2LE=.png","StudentID":null,"GameID":"173032376","Picture":null,"IDCardPic1":null,"IDCardPic2":null,"EMail":null,"Address":"北京-大兴区","Sex":"男","Birthday":"\/Date(1458230400000)\/","RegisterDate":null,"Unit":null,"Job":null,"Hobby":null,"SysTime":[0,0,0,0,0,0,45,178]}]

member.summary: 更改个人信息，传入手机号和要更改的字段，不更改字段不要传
member.returns: 更改成功：{"MessageCode":0,"Message":""} 用户不存在：{"MessageCode":10001,"Message":"no user"}
